ignoreCommand: if git rev-parse HEAD^ >/dev/null 2>&1; then git diff --quiet HEAD^ HEAD -- . && exit 0 || exit 1; fi; exit 1
installCommand: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@10.30.1 --activate && corepack pnpm --version && if [ -f ../../pnpm-lock.yaml ]; then corepack pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --lockfile-dir ../..; else corepack pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile; fi
